bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Ethernet -- Amendment 2: Media Access Control Parameters, Physical Layers, and Management Parameters for 25 Gb/s Operation Amendment 2: Media Access Control Parameters, Physical Layers, and Management Parameters for 25 Gb/s Operation

IEEE Standard for Ethernet -- Amendment 2: Media Access Control Parameters, Physical Layers, and Management Parameters for 25 Gb/s Operation Amendment 2: Media Access Control Parameters, Physical Layers, and Management Parameters for 25 Gb/s Operation
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.3by-2016 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 as amended by IEEE Std 802.3bw-2015)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 adds Physical Layer (PHY) specifications and management parameters for 25 Gb/s operation over twinaxial copper cabling (25GBASE-CR and 25GBASE-CR-S), electrical backplanes (25GBASE-KR and 25GBASE-KR-S), and multimode fiber (25GBASE-SR). This amendment also specifies a 25 Gigabit Attachment Unit Interface (25GAUI) and optional Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE).

This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 adds Physical Layer (PHY) specifications and management parameters for 25 Gb/s operation over twinaxial copper cabling (25GBASE-CR and 25GBASE-CR-S), electrical backplanes (25GBASE-KR and 25GBASE-KR-S), and multimode fiber (25GBASE-SR). This amendment also specifies a 25 Gigabit Attachment Unit Interface (25GAUI) and optional Energy Efficient Etherenet (EEE).

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
